title: How to Make an Oat and Raspberry Smoothie

steps.headline: Gather your ingredients and other items you will need.
steps.description: See "Ingredients" and "Things You'll Need" sections above and below.

steps.headline: Add in the oats, honey, raspberries, and skimmed milk into the blender.
Blend until smooth.
steps.description: For added freshness, add a few ice cubes within the mix if you'd like.

steps.headline: Pour into glasses.
steps.description: If you didn't want to blend the ice cubes in, add them in afterwards if you would like without blending them.

steps.headline: Serve with a few raspberries on the side and enjoy!

text: Gather your ingredients and other items you will need. See "Ingredients" and "Things You'll Need" sections above and below. Add in the oats, honey, raspberries, and skimmed milk into the blender.  Blend until smooth. For added freshness, add a few ice cubes within the mix if you'd like. Pour into glasses. If you didn't want to blend the ice cubes in, add them in afterwards if you would like without blending them. Serve with a few raspberries on the side and enjoy!
